/* Population */ Once again, stop calling them Bukharian. And we did come to the US after the collapse of the US. There is proof on our page.
/* Assimilation and population changes */ Once again, correcting spelling. The community in the US calls itself Bukharian. Don't mess with it.
/* Food */ Sephardics and Mizrahis don't make bagels.
/* Language */ Bukharians are Mizrahi. And they don't even speak Portuguese. What kind of a joker said this?
/* Language */ The Bukharians all over America have a Bukharian Congress, not Bukharan. They are descirbed as Bukharians. Saying otherwise is vandalizism.

moved [[Jews and Judaism in the United States]] to [[American Jews]] over redirect: Please discuss this on the talk page first, there is no consensus and this deals with Jews as an ethnicity. See [[Jew]] article versus the [[Judaism]] article.
